Your group has been wandering these lands for a while now, and you've finally decided to settle down and build a home.

You are all from different walks of life, but you have one thing in common: you all love a show about cartoon ponies, and have taken its lessons to heart.

You'll need to work fast in order to secure your new home, though; your starting weapons are very basic and you are in posession of a lot of valuable items, thus making you tempting targets for raiders.
